reviewText:
A slow moving movie with an uninteresting plot.
Some of the football team were not allowed to play on the team because they took and hid a backpack of
a new player.  This action was built up as a serious offense, when teens do such pranks on new football
players often.
I don't recommend this film.
Great movie for the entire family. Powerful message about doing what's right and the importance of doing your best. Highly recommend.
This was so refreshing. This dvd reminds us that integrity is so important in life. Young people can have standards.
This was a great movie and really taught a great lesson to teens.  Ironically, this was filmed inside my old high school in Atlanta, Georgia!
I definitely would recommend this movie for a family evening at home. It was refreshing and entertaining. Ordered an extra copy for friends.
We were totally taken by surprise.  It was sooo refreshing to see people actually doing the right things; not because they were easy, but because they were right.  Don't miss this one.
